item.title: JAXB - Unmarshal XML String into Java Object
item.description: A code sample on how to unmarshal an XML String into a Java Object using JAXB.

item.title: JAXB - Marshal Element Missing @XmlRootElement Annotation
item.description: How to handle element missing @XmlRootElement annotation errors when trying to marshal a Java object using JAXB.
